title: Ticket #2290: Rename "MPI_job" in "Job executing on host: MPI_job"
description:
When a parallel job starts, you get a job log message like this: 

001 (003.000.000) 07/08 17:08:50 Job executing on host: MPI_job

Perhaps instead of "MPI_job" it should be "parallel_job" to better identify things?

Might this break existing parsers?
creator: adesmet
